page.title: 16OUR FAMILY: QUINTON
page.content: I'm a girl. I'm 11 years old with brown hair and blue eyes. My hobbies are pop music, cats, writing and dancing. My favourite subject at school is English. My Mum and Dad both have black hair. Dad's a motor mechanic at the village garage. He mends anything from lawnmowers to lorries. My Mum and Dad both enjoy working in the garden and Mum also does sewing. She likes the Women's Institute and is a bell ringer at church . My brother and I are learning to ring as well. My sister is handicapped. She collects teddy bears and likes to play with plasticine and straws. My brother is 13. He likes motor bikes and rugby. He has blue eyes and brown hair.
